marquee.line1: The new PACSS portal is now live
marquee.line2: All government and utility payment services are available in one place!
marquee.line3: Pay bills, access services, and manage everything easily from this portal.

HEROHEADER: Your Trusted Gateway to Government & Essential Services
HEROSUBHEADER: Inet provides convenient access to 300+ government and utility services across India - from passport applications to bill payments, all within your neighborhood.

FEATURES.HEADING: Why Choose Our Platform?
FEATURES.SUBHEADING: We provide seamless, secure, and reliable services to meet all your financial and utility needs

FAST_TRANSACTIONS.TITLE: Lightning Fast Transactions
FAST_TRANSACTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Process payments and services in seconds with our optimized platform

SECURITY.TITLE: Bank-Grade Security
SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: 256-bit encryption and multi-factor authentication for all transactions

MOBILE.TITLE: Mobile Friendly
MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Access all services from any device with our responsive interface

SUPPORT.TITLE: 24/7 Support
SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: Dedicated customer care team available round the clock

DISCOUNTS.TITLE: Special Discounts
DISCOUNTS.DESCRIPTION: Exclusive offers and cashback on bill payments and recharges

AUTO_PAY.TITLE: Auto Pay Options
AUTO_PAY.DESCRIPTION: Schedule recurring payments and never miss a due date

MAINTENANCE.TITLE: System Maintenance Scheduled
MAINTENANCE.DESCRIPTION: Planned maintenance this Saturday from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM. Services may be temporarily unavailable.

NEW_FEATURE.TITLE: New Feature Released
NEW_FEATURE.DESCRIPTION: We've added new reporting tools to help you analyze your transactions more effectively.

MOBILE_UPDATE.TITLE: Mobile App Update
MOBILE_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: Version 2.5 of our mobile app is now available with improved performance and new UI.

HOLIDAY_SCHEDULE.TITLE: Holiday Schedule
HOLIDAY_SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Our customer support will have limited availability during the upcoming national holidays.
